src:
Urmează Gala ZF 2019, 21 noiembrie 30 de ani de capitalism, 30 de ani de business în România, 3 generaţii de antreprenori. Cine duce România mai departe şi unde? Cum a fost în 2006 şi ce a spus Roland Berger atunci
05 Nov 2019, 22:05 by Alina-Elena Vasiliu
Primele două gale aniversare sub emblema Ziarului Financiar, din anii 2006 şi 2007, au adus la un loc nu doar mii de invitaţi reprezentativi pentru mediul local de business, ci şi nume internaţionale, precum invitatul special Roland Berger.
De-a lungul anilor, printre invitaţii speciali ai galelor ZF - cu funcţiile de la momentul respectiv - s-au regăsit Wolfgang Munchau - analist Financial Times (2011), Michel Cam­dessus - director general şi preşedinte al con­siliului executiv al Fondului Monetar Internaţional (2013), Jan Rostowski - fostul ministru de finanţe al Poloniei (2014), Andreas Treichl - CEO al grupului bancar austriac Erste şi Mark Andersen - strategul băncii elveţiene UBS (2017), Adrian Wooldridge - editorialist cu vechime al revistei economice The Economist (2018) şi alţii.
Gala ZF este, în fiecare an, prilejul cu care premiem cele mai valoroase companii din România, conform anuarului realizat de ZF în parteneriat cu casa de investiţii BT Capital Partners.
Cum arăta peisajul economic românesc la primele gale ale ZF?
text:
Next is the Gala ZF 2019, November 21, 30 years of capitalism, 30 years of business in Romania, 3 generations of entrepreneurs. Who takes Romania further and where? What it was like in 2006 and what Roland Berger said back then
05 Nov 2019, 22:05 by Alina-Elena Vasiliu
The first two anniversary celebrations under the emblem of the Financial Newspaper, from 2006 and 2007, brought not only thousands of representative guests for the local business environment, but also international names, such as special guest Roland Berger.
Over the years, among the special guests of the ZF Gala - with the functions at that time - were Wolfgang Munchau - Financial Times analyst (2011), Michel Camdessus - CEO and Chairman of the Executive Board of the International Monetary Fund (2013). ), Jan Rostowski - former finance minister of Poland (2014), Andreas Treichl - CEO of the Austrian banking group Erste and Mark Andersen - the strategist of the Swiss bank UBS (2017), Adrian Wooldridge - senior editor of The Economist (2018) and others.
The ZF Gala is, every year, the occasion with which we award the most valuable companies in Romania, according to the directory created by ZF in partnership with the investment house BT Capital Partners.
What did the Romanian economic landscape look like at the first stages of the ZF?
